data.actual_result: A message appears [. . .] and the Cancel button is invisible, but clickable (near the Okay button)
data.expected_result: A message appears telling you that some settings were not saved and you have an Okay and Cancel button. The cancel button should be visible, and near the Okay one
data.short_description: The "Cancel" button for the unsaved changes message is invisible (happens in multiple places: Server Overview settings, Channel Settings...etc)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your server's settings, overview section (or to one of your channel settings) - Make changes (like a new server name/channel name) - Press the back button/Try to exit to the chat
